dcterms:description: A query-focused meeting summarization dataset consisting of 1,808 query-focused summaries extracted from 232 multi-turn meetings across various domains, including product design, academia, and political committees. The dataset includes annotations such as topic segmentations and highlighted text spans associated with reference summaries.
dcterms:title: QMSum

dcterms:creator: Alex Wang

dcterms:description: A collection of question-focused abstractive summarization data comprising 100 stories, 500 questions, and 2000 summaries. Each question in the dataset is accompanied by 4 reference summaries, written by trained writers who reviewed each otherâ€™s work to ensure the data is of high quality.
dcterms:title: SQuALITY
